content:
It sounds like you had a positive experience with Petco!

Yes, Petco is known for offering discounts and promotions, especially for new customers. They often provide a discount on the first purchase, usually in the form of a promo code or a sign-up offer. This is a great way to try out their products and services while saving some money.

It's awesome to hear that the new cat litter box has been working well for Luna! Petco carries a wide range of pet supplies, including litter boxes, and it's great that you found one that suits your cat's needs.

If you're planning to make another purchase from Petco, I recommend checking their website for any current promotions or discounts. They often have deals on specific products, brands, or categories, and you might be able to snag a discount on your next purchase.

Additionally, you can sign up for their email newsletter or follow their social media accounts to stay informed about upcoming promotions and sales. Petco also has a rewards program called Petco Pals Rewards, which offers points for every dollar spent, redeemable for discounts and other perks.

Remember to always check the terms and conditions of any promotion or discount to ensure it applies to your purchase. Happy shopping for Luna!
